channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2023 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.12 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.12 for .NET has been released! Aspose.TeX for .NET plugins has been created. Key Summary Category TEXNET-289 Implement support for fonts provided by external packages Enhancement TEXNET-286 Implement \middle delimiter primitive from the eTeX extension Enhancement TEXNET-287 Implement conversion from TeX/LaTeX to multi-frame TIFFs Enhancement Public API Added APIs Property Aspose.TeX.Features.FigureRendererOptions.Margin Method Aspose.TeX.IO.InputFileSystemDirectory.GetFileNamesByExtension(System.String,System.String) Method Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.10 for .NET has been released! Aspose.TeX for .NET plugins has been created. Key Summary Category TEXNET-271 Implement the mixed direction typesetting as part of the eTeX extension Enhancement TEXNET-276 Create plugins Enhancement TEXNET-283 Implement testing for errors occurred along a TeX file processing Enhancement Public API Added APIs Type Aspose.TeX.Plugins.DataType Field Aspose.TeX.Plugins.DataType.Stream Field Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.8 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.8 for .NET has been released! Key Summary Category TEXNET-259 Implement eTeX’s tracing and diagnostics primitives Enhancement TEXNET-261 Implement additional eTeX’s token list parameters Enhancement TEXNET-260 Implement eTeX’s modifications to the paragraph building algorithm Enhancement TEXNET-264 Implement the \iffontchar and \readline eTeX’s primitives Enhancement Public API Added APIs Renamed APIs Modified APIs Removed APIs Got Queries?

item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.6 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.6 for .NET has been released! Key Summary Category TEXNET-255 Set up .NET 7 support Feature TEXNET-258 Enhance eTeX extension support Enhancement Public API Added APIs Property Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.FullInputFileNames Renamed APIs Modified APIs Removed APIs Got Queries? If you have any query related to Aspose.TeX for .NET API, please feel free to write to reach us on Aspose.TeX forum.

item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.4 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.4 for .NET has been released! Key Summary Category TEXNET-245 Turn on font subsetting for SVG math rendering and SVG figure rendering by default Feature TEXNET-244 Fix the longtable package issue reported on Free Support Forum Bug Public API Added APIs Renamed APIs Modified APIs Removed APIs Got Queries? item.title: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.2 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.TeX 23.2 for .NET has been released! A generic LaTeX code fragment renderer called the Figure Renderer has been implemented. Please note! .NET Framework versions 3.5 and below will not be supported starting with the next version of the API. Key Summary Category TEXNET-238 Implement a generic LaTeX code fragment renderer Feature Public API Added APIs Type Aspose.
